description:
Season: 20
Original Air Date: 1/02/2007

Taylor tells Nick that he caught her off guard with their kiss. Taylor and Nick reflect back on the night (a long time ago) when they were both drinking and they almost got together and agree it was a very vulnerable time for both of them. When Taylor asks him about selling back Forrester Creations, he tells her he doesn’t want to sell back without turning a profit first. Stephanie tells Ridge that Jackie was a prostitute and if Nick doesn’t sell back the company soon she will blackmail him with this information to get it back. Taylor arrives to inform Stephanie that Nick will sell back the Forrester soon but he’s not ready to now. Stephanie is too impatient to wait and decides to confront Nick. She goes to Nick’s house and presents him with a sales contract for him to sign but he refuses. Stephanie informs him that he’s made a big mistake. Jackie is angry with Taylor for opening Nick’s old wounds. She is afraid that now Nick won’t be able to see her in the same way again.
